attributes.action: Childcare by Grandparents & family members to be recognised and payed.
attributes.background: Millions of grandparents take care of thier grandchildren with out recognition. Allowing thousands of people to work and provide for thier children. Why can they not claim this as a job or even be paid for there time?

rejection.details: We don't understand how you want family members to be paid. You could start a new petition about this, but you need to ensure that you are calling for clear, specific action from the Government or Parliament.
